messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Testing...no reply necessary
messages.msgSnippet: We are all meditating. Well, I was till you disturbed me with the You have mail! sound.... Dewa, Andres
messages.messageBody:
We are all meditating. Well, I was till you disturbed me with the
"You have mail!" sound....

Dewa,

Andres

>Just checking to see if this comes back to me. No messages since

>quiet for the past week or so, so it seems. No replies
>necessary...if this comes to me, I'll know it is just very, very
>quiet out there in sword-land.

>Ron

messages.subject: Testing...no reply necessary
messages.msgSnippet: Just checking to see if this comes back to me. No messages since yesterday morning...seems odd. Of course it has been exceptionally quiet for the past week or
messages.messageBody:
Just checking to see if this comes back to me. No messages since yesterday morning...seems odd. Of course it has been exceptionally quiet for the past week or so, so it seems. No replies necessary...if this comes to me, I'll know it is just very, very quiet out there in sword-land.

Ron
STL
